channel.title: RoArm-M2-S on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in RoArm-M2-S on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Controlling RoArm-M2-S with ROS2
item.description: Learn how to set up and control the RoArm-M2-S robotic arm using ROS2 in a virtual environment. This guide walks you through installing VirtualBox, creating a custom Ubuntu VM, setting up ROS2 with MoveIt2, and running driver nodes to control the arm through RViz, MoveIt, keyboard, and a web interface.

item.title: Wave Rover: Setup Guide and Troubleshooting Tips
item.description: This guide walks you through setting up the Wave Rover, including hardware connections and software configuration. It covers common issues like missing drivers and file errors, providing step-by-step solutions for problems such as the CP2102N USB to UART Bridge Controller and missing libraries like ArduinoJson or Adafruit_GFX. Whether you’re troubleshooting hardware connections or resolving compilation errors, this guide ensures a smooth setup process.
